channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek Hangout – Episode 2 – OS Version Support, Custom Map Apps, and Widgets API

item.title: By: charlesmckeever
item.dc:creator: charlesmckeever
item.description: Thank you Hector. We are very lucky to have Brian on the show. He is a great resource. He's been very supportive. Would you like us to discuss something in particular on the show?
item.content:encoded: Thank you Hector. We are very lucky to have Brian on the show. He is a great resource. He’s been very supportive. Would you like us to discuss something in particular on the show?

item.title: By: Hector Sanchez
item.dc:creator: Hector Sanchez
item.description: Great job with the 2nd show. A lot more organized vs the first one and I also like that you have Brian Burton in the show, I bought his book in December and I'm still using it as a reference book when I need to consult something about Corona
item.content:encoded: Great job with the 2nd show. A lot more organized vs the first one and I also like that you have Brian Burton in the show, I bought his book in December and I’m still using it as a reference book when I need to consult something about Corona
